---
title: "Designing Clinical Trials - Ch 1"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(plyr)
library(dplyr)
library(collapsibleTree)
d_1 = read.csv("../data/ch1_nodes_anatomy_outline_of_study_protocol.csv")
d_2 = read.csv("../data/ch1_edges_anatomy_outline_of_study_protocol_subelements.csv")
d_3 = d_1 %>%
  left_join(d_2, by = c("Element" = "Element")) %>%
  mutate(root = "Anatomy of clinical trials")

collapsibleTree(df = d_3, 
                hierarchy = c("Element", "Sub.element"), 
                root = "Anatomy of clinical trials",
                attribute = "Purpose",
                tooltip = TRUE,
                aggFun = first
                )



```
